name: Cloudseam Scale
description: Cold and solid scales from a Solitary Suanni. They retain pure adeptal energyeven after falling off and cannot be damaged by ordinary weapons.  Ordinary beasts can sometimes be affected by errant adeptal energy and becomemore powerful than usual. However, a suanni's adeptal energy originates fromwithin themselves, which is why their leader is often regarded as equal toadepti.
